comments:
Build ID: M20070212-1330

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Work with Eclipse
2.Reduce main window and turn wks into hibernating mode
3.Wake up the Wks and restoring main Window


More information:
Worked for hours with eclipse, then worsktation has been turned into hibernating mode. On wake up, when I tryed to restore minimized Eclipse window, I got an error message box  telling to see in .log for more details.

here is the part of the log file linked to the crash.


!SESSION Thu Apr 12 14:19:43 CEST 2007 -----------------------------------------
!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.launcher 4 0 2007-04-12 14:19:43.417
!MESSAGE -exitdata
!STACK
java.lang.InterruptedException
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.runCommand(Main.java:1571)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.setExitData(Main.java:1016)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:1007)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:952)
